Better Empowerment Now to Enhance Framework and Improve Treatments Act of 2017
A bill to strengthen the use of patient-experience data within the benefit-risk framework for approval of new drugs.
BENEFIT Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
